subject: Native Americans
Football
Names, Organizational
lead_paragraph: Roger Goodell helped integrate his high school football team. Now he has a chance to again come down on the right side of history in the debate over the Washington Redskins’ nickname.
snippet: Roger Goodell helped integrate his high school football team. Now he has a chance to again come down on the right side of history in the debate over the Washington Redskins’ nickname.
